job.title: Data Engineer AWS/Azure
job.description:
I am currently working with an exceptional organization who are an emerging advanced analytics and AI consulting firm. They bring their expertise in AI, Machine Learning, and Data Analytics to their clients across the world. They have strong relationships with several Fortune 500 companies, which allows them to grow and strengthen their business. This company is growing at a fast pace and has been recognized by Gartner and Forrester for their leadership


They are looking for the best Data Engineers across the US to join where they will handle designing and implementation of advanced analytics capabilities.

 

Qualifications:

  • 6+ Years of experience working in Data Engineering
  • Exceptional Python expertise
  • Experience with Azure OR AWS cloud services




**If you are interested, please send me your resume, multiple time windows to speak, email, and phone number so I can book in it on our calendars. Additionally, referrals are appreciated.**
